explains: n. 配对；摞合；[机] 双层轧制
wordGroup: chromosome pairing 染色体配对，染色体接合

sentences.en: It's like the teacher who breaks up the troublemakers in the back row by pairing them with better-behaved classmates.
sentences.cn: 这就像老师把后排的捣乱分子分开，并把他们与表现较好的同学配对一样。

sentences.en: The two actors are an unlikely pairing.
sentences.cn: 这二位演员不大可能是搭档。

sentences.en: It seemed that all her friends were pairing off.
sentences.cn: 好像她的朋友全都成双结对了。
